name: Colored Item Names
description: (v1.0.4 - Updated: Oct 2019) Colorizes item names everywhere based on the item's grade/rarity (not stars). Also colors any set pieces green and colors any recipes by their crafted item's rarity instead of their own rarity.

name: F**k Pets!
description: Hides pet stats and disables the annoying pet ring-menu. No more pets getting in the way of talking to NPCs or accidentally opening their menu in the middle of a fight!
